bibl.title: Two Coptic Inscriptions from the Monastery of Jeremiah at Saqqara.
bibl.note: Edition of two inscriptions found during the excavations conducted by the National Museum of Antiquities of Leyden and the Department of Egyptology at the University of Leyden in 2003. - 1. Tombstone for a deceased woman called Mary (Inv. SAK 2003/R31). - 2. Door lintel (Inv. SAK 2003/R30). - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Marteen Horn, Two Coptic Inscriptions from the Monastery of Jeremiah at Saqqara.

Edition of two inscriptions found during the excavations conducted by the National Museum of Antiquities of Leyden and the Department of Egyptology at the University of Leyden in 2003. - 1. Tombstone for a deceased woman called Mary (Inv. SAK 2003/R31). - 2. Door lintel (Inv. SAK 2003/R30). - Conclusion.
